channel.title: Intermediate on Science Communication: BTC
channel.description: Recent content in Intermediate on Science Communication: BTC

item.title: Proof of Work
item.description: Proof of Work is the most used and tested way for crypto currencies to build the blockchain.

item.title: Proof of Stake
item.description: Proof of Stake is a way to validate blocks for the blockchain without providing a big amount of computing power. It’s used for many newer crypto currencies and some established ones are even shifting from the Proof of Work concept to Proof of Stake.

item.title: Bitcoin
item.description: Bitcoin known as the first crypto currency.

item.title: Ethereum
item.description: Etherum is one of the most common representative of the crypto currencies.
